Description: I have 3 years of experience using python for game development, data scraping, data science and machine learning.
I am knowledgeable with its libraries such as kivy, pygame, tensorflow, numpy, matplotlib, beautiful soup, tkinter etc.
I have 4 years of experience using Java for creating applications and scripting.
I am knowledgeable with its libraries such as Java Swing and Java FX
I have 2 years of experience using Javascript for Web Development and Data scraping
I use libraries associated with it such as Puppeteer, Next JS, Tailwind, Bootstrap, Node JS etc.
I have 1 year of experience using C++ for competitive programing, https and windows socketing
I have used MySQL for 3 years now and has created simple to complex databases all satisfying the first to 4th normal forms
I have created databases for School System and Course Websites with scalability able to accommodate upto millions of users
I have a year of experience using MongoDB for portfolio websites.
I have a year of experience using Firebase, specifically its realtime database
I have also used other tools offered by it such as token based athentication and email dissemination
I have worked with tesorflow for 2 years, using it for machine learning and research projects
I have also experienced implementing tensorflow to work with the GPU for computationally intensive tasks
I have 2 year of experience using numpy alongside tensorflow.
I specifically use numpy for CPU intensive tasks such as simple calculations and data plotting
I have used puppeteer to scrape complex data that live deep inside websites
Using it, I have scaped airline data, news data, social media data and e-commerce data
I use Selenium as an alternative for puppeteer in python.
I have used selenium for creating bots to boost activities, simulate traffic and gather information updates about a website
I have a year of experience using Next Js to create websites, and this is one of those
I use Next  JS alongside React with EsLint for linting, Tailwind for style and Firebase for authentication and database
I have 2 year of experience using React. I use react for almost every website I create
I have used Node JS for creating full stack websites for a year.
Although I already replaced it with Next JS, I still use it for simple websites
I have a year of experience using Bootrap.
I use it for creating fast prototypes for simple websites
I have a month of experience using Tailwind and I am still learning!
This is the first website where I used tailwind
I have a year of experience using React Query and I mostly Use it for data fetching
I have 2 years of experience using Figma for all sorts of creative endevours.
I use it to design websites, create logos, posters, resumes and so on.
